EmailTemplate.subject: Save up to $25,000 Upgrading Your King Air Panel and Get Inflight Internet Access!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Purchase an AeroVue option bundle for King Air B200 and receive free AeroWave hardware
Now through March 29, 2019, BendixKing is offering free AeroWave™ internet connectivity hardware with the purchase of an option package with an AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck upgrade, valued at over $25,000.
AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck
- Lowers operating costs - Replaces all legacy avionics and autopilot with state of the art hardware - Reduces pilot workload and fatigue - Reduces aircraft weight up to 125 LBS - Includes industry-leading SmartView™ synthetic vision system
Optional bundles include weather radar, XM weather, radar altimeter, traffic alert, ground proximity warning and internet connectivity with AeroWave. AeroWave <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerowave-100]]> is a satellite communications system that allows you, your co-pilot and your passengers to send text messages, browse the web, send email and make phone calls:
- Connect to worldwide in-flight weather - Unlimited Data and Affordable Voice Calls
Offer ends soon; order your upgrade and option package now to save $25,000.
FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_Q1_2019.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking_aerovue]]>
